MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL19 postcode area of Gronant. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.38am. There are engineers on site are continuing to investigate the cause of the fuse failure. We are now expecting the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.22pm on 29th of April 2021.
